text:
This graphic from @VisualCap shows that 13% of nations have bought over 50% of #COVID19  #vaccine pushing countries like #SouthAfrica to the back of the queue.

Show gratitude for your #vaccination - give £5 to help #children until they can have theirs.

 https://t.co/FQedlGtwLS https://t.co/XDFvnpLoLZ
